content: SHANGHAI  Jan 3 China's Internet regulator has accused NetEase Inc  a U.S.-listed Chinese web portal  of spreading rumours and pornography  in the authorities' latest move to "clean up" the country's online space.
name: NetEase Inc
title: China blasts NetEase for spreading porn in latest push to cleanse cyberspace
